definitions.definition: Short in length of time from the present.
examples: I need the soonest date you have available.

definitions.definition: Used as an alternative to express 'to be going to' in the form 'to be soon to'.
examples: Hurry up, the wedding is soon to start!
A new shop is soon to be opened in this street.

main_definition: Short in length of time from the present.
secondary_definitions: Used as an alternative to express 'to be going to' in the form 'to be soon to'.
